Reviews.Title: “Very satisfied”
Reviews.Author: CRISTINA D Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: hotel lovely clean spacious helpful staff enjoyed staying unfortunately location recommend people dont mind travelling outside town night perfect car despite distance hotel value money

Reviews.Title: “Good budget hotel if you don't mind not being in the centre of Rome”
Reviews.Author: DrewB_10
Reviews.Content: little hard isnt italy worth stay looking hotel reasonable amenities wasnt centre rome hence cheaper exactly citta grand means found clean friendly time stay 1015 min walk nearest train station central rome station closer hotel due stayed 5 nights 3rd floor clean somewhat basic bit italian travelodge space extras found breakfast huge selection charge day question hotel looking stay outside centre rome save little money

Reviews.Content: selected hotel reasonable price close airport cheap added trip airport morning require cut lunch tour bus drop taxi driver terrible trouble finding basically bad location top dangerous leave food footpaths busy roads stuck eating
